name: Mario Kart Wii Time Trial Ghost
summary: An RKG file is a time trial ghost used in Mario Kart Wii, a racing game for the Nintendo Wii. It contains data used to show a ghost racer that a player must beat during a timed race. RKG files specify a ghost's kart, character, drift type, and course route, which is saved as a series of controller inputs that Mario Kart Wii recreates.
